Literature.Title: Discovery of daspyromycins A and B, 2-aminovinyl-cysteine containing lanthipeptides, through a genomics-based approach
Literature.Author: Shi J, Ma J, Wang Y, Xu Z, Zhang B, Jiao RH, Tan RX, Ge H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus capitis W7(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium VR(MIC=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.3344(MIC=>128µg/ml),Shigella sonnei(MIC=>128µg/ml),Paracidovorax avenae ATCC 19307(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae ATCC BAA-2502(MIC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae ATCC 35933(MIC=2µg/ml)
